## Description {#details}

Format provider for <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#a52f2c3fdd7f80c1991d8c7079489efff">TimePoint&lt;&gt;</a>

The options string is a strftime format string, with extensions:
<ul>
<li>L is millis: 000-999</li>
<li>f is micros: 000000-999999</li>
<li>N is nanos: 000000000 - 999999999</li>
</ul>


If no options are given, the default format is &quot;%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S.%N&quot;.

Definition at line 92 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/chrono-h">Chrono.h</a>.
